title: Mouse and Keyboard not registering input once match starts
body:
Problem:
The game literally doesn't register any mouse or keyboard input once a game match starts.
I can alt tab out, and I can chat and use the mouse fine in the background part of LoL that has the chat, missions, friends list etc.  The best way to describe the actual game playing part acts as if it's some sort of  "livestream Windows Vista background" on my computer with 0 interaction.
Oddly enough when I alt tab out, I can close the part of LoL with the chat / friends list / settings etc., yet the game still registers me as connected and it doesn't actually close down all the way and eventually it just registers me as AFK since I'm "in" the game, just unable to interact with it. The game was working fine two days ago, but now... not so much. =(

I run the most recent version / update of Windows 10 (64bit)
Mouse: Logitech G600
Keyboard: Logitech G510s

I run the game in Borderless Window mode if that helps.
I have dual Monitors and my mouse just moves freely between the two when the problem starts which is typically before the match starts sometimes a few seconds in. I've had my mouse "move off" the game screen in the past, but I could just alt + tab back into the windowed mode and it worked fine again.

If it helps my cursor goes from the typical "gauntlet" hand in LoL to the normal cursor pointer.
I've restarted, rebooted, uninstalled and reinstalled the Logitech software a couple times.
This mouse and keyboard work fine on my other computer with league though, so it's not them as the culprit. =S

Any help would be appreciated.
Thanks!

replies.body:
Hmmmmm yea that sounds pretty odd. It seems like your keybinds might not be downloading or updating correctly on that specific pc, so it'd be worth trying to reset those manually really quickly.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
Same. I just tried to play a game and couldn't do anything but sit there and watch. No mouse or keyboard stroke did anything. Game it literally unplayable.

guys every time i join a game my mouse doesnt turn to the glove and my mouse and keyboard do not interact with the game
i can see my mouse but when i right click the champion doesnt move or when i do any command like esc or alt f4
its like i am in the game but cannot control a thing like i am only watching

Having the exact same issue, as of today!

Running as admin did seem to fix it. I hope this is patched soon.
Currently Running a full repair on the client to see if that fixes things, I'll update here once that is done.

Repair did nothing to fix it.
I have found at least in a couple test runs, that running the game as an administrator seems to fix it.
If I run the game normally, the problem happens every time the game starts, but when I force stop the client and rerun it as administrator it goes away.
I have successfully done this 3 times now, testing back and forth between normal / administrative mode with "positive" results.
Not sure if that is technically a fix, and I doubt that the game is working as intended but it's something temporary that may help anyone else having issues. =S
